memberships.name: Non-profit Member
memberships.description: This memebership is only for Non profit Organizations, no fees are charged.
memberships.benefits: Advertisement for fundrisings on our website at no cost.

memberships.name: Bronze Member
memberships.description: This memebership does not include advertisement.
memberships.benefits: Free admision to one special event a year.

memberships.name: Silver Member
memberships.description: This membership includes discounted advertisement in our website.
memberships.benefits: Free admision to three special events a year. One trainig session every quarter. A spotligh position once a month for 76 hours. 25% discount in Advertisement.

memberships.name: Gold Member
memberships.benefits: Free admision to all special events and training. Continuous spotlight position in the home page. Use of our hall for company events at no cost.
